name: ​Drunk Adventures
description:
Drunk Adventures is a first person platformer game where your only purpose is to find all the beer and drink it! The game gets progressively more difficult the more you drink, and you will lose more and more control of the character.

The game contains 4 levels. After beating it (if you do), the game will reset a New Game+ with added difficulty.

Version with an easier Level 2:
https://kroporo.github.io/GMTK2020/index.html

Controls:
- WASD to move the character
- Mouse to look around
- J to reset the level (if stuck)
